name: ENDER OCEAN - Your mission: "Clean the Ocean"
name_original: ENDER OCEAN - Your mission: "Clean the Ocean"
description:
ENDER OCEAN™ is an innovative environmental video game. Players control remote-controlled robots to perform underwater cleaning missions.

The game includes software levels where players have to face virtual challenges to earn points (pick up plastic waste, remove fishing nets...). And material levels, where they can participate in real sessions in natural environment (lakes, rivers, sea...) and collect real waste by staying at home.
